message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $180. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $140. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really like the product!
Alice, $140 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $100. This is the best I can do.
I'm not willing to go as low as $100, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $130. It's a great product, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
Alice,  I appreciate you coming down in price, but $130 is still too high for me. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $100. I'm sure we can find a way to make this work.

I'm starting to think we're not on the same page, Bob. I can see you really want this product, so I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $120. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price for a great product like this!
